attributes.action: Stop Hunts causing havoc and being violent to innocent bystanders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hunt cause havoc at animal sanctuary 

On Monday the West Norfolk Foxhound caused havoc at a Norfolk animal sanctuary. The huntsman lost control of hounds after allegedly following a trail. (HW: That's funny cos the West Norfolk's hunt with a bird of prey, they do not hunt trails! 

After sanctuary staff at PACT asked the hunt to remove their animals, members of the West Norfolk foxhounds spat and rode at the workers, leaving two of them with injured. Two other workers witnessed the hounds killing something in the field. Staff are convineced it is one of their rescued cats which has failed to return. Borrett, one of the masters claimed their hounds wouldn't go after peoples pets - Of COURSE THEY WOULD

Radio Norfolk interview

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
